document.title: Woordcombinaties
document.intro: Woordcombinaties shows how words are used in example sentences, which words are typically and/or frequently combined and how (valency) patterns together with collocations are used in building sentences. Displays example sentences, combinatory constraints, patterns.

properties.intro: Woordcombinaties shows how words are used in example sentences, which words are typically and/or frequently combined and how (valency) patterns together with collocations are used in building sentences. Displays example sentences, combinatory constraints, patterns.
